column4: so normal DVD's will play fine in Totem/MPlayer/VLC... but DVD's I've burned will not.  Nautilus won't even mount them.  They're not even recognized.  The DVD's play fine on my Windows/XBOX/etc.  Anyone ran into problems like this?
What's the best email client for connecting to Exchange?  Is there a client that'll support connecting to Exchange servers directly, rather than using OWA (like in Evolution)?
Exhange 2007 comes with an API. I think the Evolution developers are working to make Evolution use the API some time in the future...
